name: CIZION
overview:
Cizion is the maker of LiveRe, a social commenting solution for blogs and other websites which allows visitors to choose from their own mix of social media accounts. Commenters sign in once and LiveRe groups the accounts together, allowing users to log-in with any one of their IDs in the future. Each time a visitor leaves a reply, it can be shared across all of their accounts, or only the ones they wish.

LiveRe makes comments social, benefiting site owners by increasing comment quality while controlling spam and trolls. Sites also benefit from increased traffic and LiveRe’s advanced comment management system.
